strings.string: This preference allows you to customise the templates used for protocols (or link types) displayed on the Insert Link pop-up. The keyword %%%%link%%%% is replaced by the Link field in the Insert Link pop-up - this can appear anywhere in the string, allowing you to make 'pseudo-protocols' that expand to a link in a certain format. The 'http', 'https', 'mailto' and 'ftp' protocols are core to the system, and cannot be deleted or modified.
